text:
I interviewed everyone asking,
"What do you do after school for fun?"

Chiyoko-senpai said she "eats snacks with friends",
while Juri-chan said "sometimes buy croquettes".

It feels like everyone's pretty much
the same as usual, right?
Yes! They're all the people I know!

Natsuha-san seems to go shopping!
She goes on a little trip by car to somewhere far!

Natsuha can drive, after all! So, what kind of
high school student do you plan to be, Kaho?

I'll buy croquettes in the shopping district,
look for snacks with friends, eat, and chat!!

And then, when I become a college student,
I'll go shopping a little farther away!
